alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:59AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln, southwestern Logan, southeastern McPherson and southwestern Custer Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 558 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of North Platte Airport, or 13 miles northeast of North Platte, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Brady, Maxwell, North Platte Airport, Keith, Etna, Lodi and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 178 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 87 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
